data.title: THIS is the one
data.body:
With all the Magsafe/Qi 2 car mounts out there, I was looking for the best one. I decided to try this one and am very happy with my purchase.

A lot of them are very similar, but the reason I went with this one is that there's no stupid logo or text staring at you in the face whenever you go to use it.

That said, this does everything very well too. The magnets are strong, and sometimes I even have to pull with a decent amount of force to break the magnetism. The phone is definitely going nowhere when you're driving. I'm sure it'll even hold a tablet no problem if you really want to attach one. It should be noted that I have a case on my phone with embedded magnets in it to Magsafe/Qi 2 specs. If you have a case without it, the magnetism will be weaker since it will have more material to go through. If this is a problem though or the phone itself does not have this spec, this mount does include a magnetic ring to attach to the outside or directly to the phone.

The plate attachment to your car using adhesive is rock solid. The bond holds extremely well and when the day comes when I want to take the mount off my car, it will be an ordeal. The 3M VHB adhesive that they use I've seen and used on other mounts and I can tell you it will hold pretty much anything.

I have not used the vent attachment since I will not be needing it. Also remember that if you are using any vent attachment that any time you use the heater be sure it is not blowing on your phone. The heat will kill performance, charge rate, and your battery.

data.title: Great product very sturdy.
data.body: This product is wonderful and the sticky pad on it is very strong. I have a car where there is no good place to put this. I tried to take it off and move it and the sticky pad was so strong I thought I was going to break it. When I did move it, it is still holding my phone without falling off. This is very convenient and I love it!

data.title: Extremely Sleek and Minimalistic
data.body:
Okay… I have NEVER been a fan of using a car mount. Mainly because I feel they’re extremely bulky and very non-functional.

However, I was recently asked to go and get one per a work requirement. So, after searching quite a bit, I came across this car mount.

I LOVE IT! And here’s why: it is surprisingly functional and sleek!

I bought this expecting to attach it to my windshield and leave my phone up there once I got into my car. However, when I got the package I noticed their bent attachment.

The vent attachment IS. THE. WAY!!!

The vent attachment isn’t like any other one I have seen before. All the others simply slide on to a vent and then fall off. This one RATCHETS onto the vent and it stays there!

PLUS, the magnets are super strong. I have an iPhone, so they’re very functional with the MagSafe case that I have already. I’ve never had to use a bit of force to pull my phone off on other mounts, but this one is super sturdy!

I know this is long for a phone mount, BUT IT WORKS!

Get it!

data.title: excellent!
data.body: exactly as described, easy to install, strong magnet, phone stay perfectly and adjustable!

data.title: Did not work in my car.
data.body:
I drive a 2023 Honda HRV for reference. My car does not have the typical vents that would have allowed me to use this a vent mount. Unfortunately the shape and texture of my dashboard would not allow for mounting either. My dashboard has an area behind the infotainment screen that is not leather but the mount would be blocked by that screen which defeats the purpose.

So I gave this to my son who drives an older model Hyundai and he was able to mount it on his dashboard without issue. So keep in my that if you dashboard is soft and leather texture then this mount will not adhere to it. It was very straightforward to set up with the included directions. Very reasonable price as well. I can’t speak to longevity since he’s only used it for a week now but it does come with an additional dash mount. Overall great MagSafe phone mount but just not for my type of car.

data.title: Very Good MagSafe Car Mount
data.body: I have tried two different brands of these MagSafe car mounts and found this brand to be superior. The magnets are considerably stronger than the other brand - maybe as much as 2X stronger - but not too strong. I’ve used this with two different MagSafe cases (steel ring built into case) and I have had no issues with either phone (iPhone 14 & 14 Pro) falling off the mount while I’m driving. The vent mount works well and is very secure with a relatively small mounting footprint. The only issue I have had was when trying to mount this to my 2011 Toyota Tundra vent. The vent fins in that vehicle have very little depth and the tightening mechanism bottomed out before tightly clamp onto the vent fin. It was a simple fix to take the mount apart and shorten the thread side of the hook in order to increase the clamping travel of the hook. It took 5 minutes to make this modification. Overall, I feel I made the right choice buying this brand and have put it in two of my vehicles.

data.title: Great product!!
data.body: Easy to set up and start using. It took me about a minute to set up in my car. I used the vent clip because I didn't want to stick anything onto my car. It's held up really well and I haven't had any issues with the clip falling out of the vent, it is nice and secure. The magnet works really well and holds my phone a far enough away from the vent that i dont have to worry about overheating my phone in the winter. I haven't had any issues with anything and I would highly recommend it to anyone in need of something like this.

data.title: Best and strongest car mount
data.body: I have been looking for so long for a good quality car mount. I finally found it. The quality for the price is insane. It also gives you a few options to mount. I already have the magnetic iPhone case so it made it easier but if you don’t have it, it includes a magnetic strip to add to your phone. I love how it gives you options to mount or to put in your vent. Super strong. Highly recommend

data.title: Surprised that it works so well
data.body: Nowadays it feels like you are making a gamble whenever you buy anything from Amazon with all the garbage that they are selling! I've been looking for a phone mount for a reasonable price for months and have even tried others from places like Costco but nothing has worked like I want it to. But this works! I got 2, one fit in the vent of my first vehicle perfectly. But the vent mount wouldn't work in the other vehicle so we had to use the adhesive mount and that worked great as well. In time I may regret this product but after a week of use I'm really happy with it and it was much cheaper than others I've looked at and tried. So if you are worried about all the garbage being sold on Amazon right now this one was actually good.

data.title: Great for your feet if used consistently
data.body: If used consistently this is a great product to keep your feet feeling like a baby’s button. I have been using this product for over a year and I never let it run out. I have it on my nightstand next to me bed. I use it after my night bath and wear some socks after applying it. If you hate sleeping with socks, I recommend just keeping the socks on for a little while to allow the product to work on your skin and then removing the socks to sleep. I recommend this product.

data.title: Stop Looking Around and Just Buy It!!!
data.body: I travel monthly (driving) for work. I was looking for a solid magsafe car mount for my F-150. I've had the ones that go in a cup holder (bulky and you lose the cup space) or the kind that you plug into the cigarette lighter (eventually wears down and doesn't stay in or stay up because you're pulling the device in/out of the lighter all the time since it is so bulky to leave in all the time). After weeks of research on products, the common complaint was the magnet wasn't strong enough (people would drive over a bump and the phone would fall off) or how the device itself would just peel off the dash. THIS ONE IS AWESOME! The magnets are SO strong! Again, I drive a truck and go over some bumpy roads, and this car mount holds up to the task! Plus it is so quick and easy to just "click" your phone up to the magnet and take off. My Brother-in-Law was looking for one and I bought one for him and he loves it as well. I HIGHLY recommend this product!!!

data.title: Strong and works well
data.body: Just bought a MagSafe case and popsocket and wanted something for my car. Was a little nervous about this being able to hold my phone, but I’ve been using it for about a week and it has been wonderful. I use the vent clip and I highly recommend it! Side note: if you have VERTICAL vents you won’t be able to use the vent clip. My husband had to use the sticky mount that came with it and while I don’t think he prefers it, it seems to be working ok for now.

data.title: Didn't work for my car but...
data.body: I have a Chevy Equinox and there is very little real estate that is flat enough to stick this to. It doesn't move enough to be able to turn the phone to be able to read it when placed flat (horizontal surface). I don't like the idea of putting my phone over the vents in my car but I did try it out and it was super easy and the magnet is GREAT! I ended up getting a different version but that's just because of my car...this is a great product!

data.title: When installed in a vent, it works great.
data.body:
I auditioned several Magsafe car mounts. I drive a small sports car that does not have many convenient mounting services. I did not expect to like this product, compared to some of the pretty ones made from high quality metal but when I installed this one in my AC vent, it worked better than all the others.

The two most important reasons that I stuck with this product is that the vent installation positioned my phone a closer to me than the dashboard mount options which were nearly a foot farther away. The closer installation makes my phone easier to see and safer to access from the driver seat.

The other stand-out aspect of this product is that the vent mount is very secure and transfers a minimal amount of vibration to the phone. The dash mounted car mounts that I tested all vibrated constantly due to the soft mounting adhesives and too much play in the mechanical parts of the mounts.

I was surprised that I liked this device better than the others since is is nearly all plastic and has a less pleasing of an appearance but, as I said above, is just works better. Upgrading the design aesthetically would make this a five-star product.

data.title: Best Phone Holder to date!
data.body: I have tried out so many holders and this magnet is very strong and will hold my phone through bumps and everything else that occurs in my van! Loving it & the fact that I can see my phone screen without holding it in my hand! The only issue I have is that in the description it says it comes with 20 magnets, comes with one to attach to whatever phone case you currently have, and then you must purchase more, which isn’t an issue. I just haven’t seen the exact magnet anywhere.

data.title: Great value. Excellent product so far.
data.body:
So I bought this on a whim. It was $10. I figured why not. I have a 2020 Mazda cx-30 preferred and finding a spot for the phone is a bit tricky. You can buy those $100+ pro mounts but even those go in between your dash and I just don't dig that idea so much.not to mention it'll stick up above the dash by a huge margin. Doesn't look great and too far away. Don't want to mess with the dash and the leather either. So I bought this for the vent mount. Not using a cup mount. I need my cupholders.

Right out of the box I was pleasantly surprised. The weight was nice and solid. Powder coated and steel. Hardened plastic knobs. The pieces were all there, wrapped nicely. I refuse to use a wallet so I have one of those card cases. Of course with a bunch of cards between the phone and magnet nothing sticks. So I attached this metal ring that came with this kit onto the back of my card case. 3m it says. Went on easily has stayed there nicely for a few weeks. No peeling or moving.

The unit itself attached right to the vent. The way the vent slats are tapered I had to attach it upside down but that's not a big deal. You can cinch it up nice and tight. You attach the phone to the mount right side up so no biggie. I've been using it for about two weeks and I actually love it.
My only complaint is the space is a little tight near my windshield wiper lever but that's not the mounts issue. Thats a car design issue.

Highly recommend. Would buy for double the price. Great value. Excellent quality.

data.title: AWESOME!!!
data.body: Okay I bought this one because I saw that you can attach it to your vent with a clip. In the past I bought one that you would just clip in as well but this one is 1000% better. The other one would fall off right away and my phone would be falling along with it. This one is amazing because it attaches to the vent and has a a hook that you can tighten. I can easily take it on and off and place it on any other vents in my car. For reference I have a Mazda CX9. Going to get one for my mother and partner since they always complain that their phone falls of the magnetic clip. So far so good.

data.title: Strong, Sturdy, Highly Recommend
data.body:
Never really been a huge fan of magnets, eventually found out: they just weren’t strong enough for what I needed them for.

This product will NOT let you down.

I drive regularly on a rocky road, and this magnet truly keeps my iPhone - and the ESR MagSafe case that it’s in - securely connected.

I also LOVE the design of the spinning method to latch the magnet onto the fan blade in the car. It has been so easy to use and very straightforward installation. This will NOT MagSafe charge your phone, heads up. Also, make sure you check the type of vents your car has, and double check with the product to make sure it will connect.

Overall, love this product, and have already recommended to 2 others, hopefully you’re next! Hope this review is helpful.

data.title: Great Product at a Bargain Price!
data.body: I am very satisfied with this purchase. Most of these type products of good quality are around $20. So at the price, this was a surprise. It comes with two dash mounts (I guess in case you mess one up?) and the in-vent mount. Now, my experience with all other vent mount products over the years has been sub-par at best. I just normally would not mount anything in the vent or buy those kind of products. HOWEVER, the design of this product mounts in the vent very secure. It isn't going anywhere. In fact after using the vent portion in my wife's car for a trip, I probably should have tried that first in my truck... However, I am purchasing a second one so both of us can securely mount our phone. It is surprisingly well made so the price is a great deal.

data.title: Best yet
data.body: I’ve been looking and looking for a vent car mount for my iPhone and this one is hands down the best. It allows you to tighten it to meet your needs. Don’t have to worry about that sticky crap that’s left on your window from the heat.

data.title: Would buy again
data.body: I’m a dump truck driver, so my day of driving is much more bumpy & extreme compared to the average vehicle, but this phone mount has supported my iPhone 15 pro max without fail for months now, & the mount holds its position despite the rough ride, the vent mount is flimsy on kenworth vents but the sticky hard mount is amazing. Worth every penny in my opinion

data.title: What took me so long?
data.body: This thing is a must have. Why did I struggle so long without it? I tightens up great on the vent and the phone goes NOWHERE. I love it. It makes my driving so much safer. BUY IT!

data.title: Great for MagSafe and for switching cars!
data.body: Love this phone holder, and the fact that it comes with different attachments, I can leave one part in my car and take the vent connector portion with me when I travel to put in rental cars!

data.title: Great hold! Talk about super magnet!
data.body: The magnet is extreme! I have an android and not an iPhone, the holder came with an adhesive ring to put on the back of a phone or phone case. The hold is tight and the vent clip is easy to adjust/fit.

data.title: Solid
data.body:
I had a clip on vent magnetic mount before this one and it was not very strong at all and would tilt down a lot and wasn't the strongest magnetic pull. I decided to get a magsafe case and this mount and it's a world of a difference. The old mount used to just squeeze around the vent cover with a rubber attachment and just hold on that way. This one actually clips to the back of the vent cover fin and then you tighten it so it operates almost like a C-Clamp. It does not move at all. And it's nice and easy to move the angle of the mount around.

The only slight downside I would say is it's pretty big and your phone sticks out more from the dashboard than my old one.. which could be a pro or con depending on your needs. I had to reposition it further away from my steering column and light signal because I kept bumping into them when trying to access the phone. Now I've got in a good spot and don't have that problem anymore Just something to be aware of.

data.title: Works great, inexpensive, solved my '22 Honda Civic Problem
data.body: My 2022 Honda Civic is cool but the air vents are hexagonal and I tried a phone mount customized for my car but it would not stay on. But there was sufficient room for the adhesive mount (it came with TWO) and it is working great. Furthermore when I rent a car next month I will have another mount that handles conventional air vents. It is solid and holding my phone well!

data.title: Simple and it works.
data.body: The only reason for giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is that the swivel head doesn't 'swivel' as much as I'd like it to, in other words, I can't tilt or tip my phone as much as I'd like. Otherwise, it's simple to install and it grabs the vent and phone well.

data.title: Phone holder
data.body: I’ve only been using it for a little but me an my husband both are loving it so far so I would definitely recommend if you’re shopping for a sturdy phone holder

data.title: Great concept / meh execution
data.body:
I bought this because it was what I was looking for. It was simple, small footprint, and seemed to do what I wanted. Mostly, that is true.

Note - this won't apply to everyone, but wanted to express my experience.

When I received the package, it was all good. I liked the base and the adhesive was both high quality and branded - two definite plusses in my book. The vent clip seemed fine as well despite not being why I bought the item.

The problem came from the magnetic component. While the magnets worked, the coupling component is one piece of plastic while the magnetic portion is a different, hard piece of plastic with the two married together via a small screw. It seems at some point, the pieces broke apart. However, the tight fit of the two pieces didn't show it right away.

At the moment, I figure given the price, it's not worth dealing with the hassle of replacement and I don't feel like returning the whole thing since half of it is already stuck to the dashboard of my car. Glue to the rescue? Right now, I'm attempting to glue the pieces together and try to make it work. Eventually I'll find the right formula that will do the job - likely crazy glue is in my future.

Overall, I can't give this a bad review. I'm disappointed surely, but the product seems functional and it is what I wanted - though not broken would have been a plus. I chalk my experience up to shipping or some other factor involved. For the price, even if I have to order a new one, it was like $10 - I'm not exactly crying over some lamented loss.

data.title: Works perfectly
data.body: I needed a new magnetic piece for my existing phone holder base in my car once I upgraded from an iPhone XR to a 15. I was able to take off the old one and just screw the plastic piece that has the MagSafe part onto the base. It holds my phone perfectly and hasn’t given me any trouble at all.

data.title: Great product -- worth every dime.
data.body: This is a wonderful product. It was easy to fix to my dashboard (actually, I mounted it on the radio face because it was smoother). I used the stick-on version, rather than the version for the slats, and let it cure for 24 hours. Since then, not a single problem and at last I can view my phone screen -- meaning the GPS maps -- while driving. I bought two, gave one away, and now am buying another one for my husband.

data.title: Easy to use
data.body: I was able to attach this to my vent with no problems. It does exactly what it is supposed to do. The magnet is very strong so no worries if going through bumpy roads. Love this phone holder.

data.title: Great magnetic phone holder for your car.
data.body: I was surprised at the magnetic adhesion that this ring has with my android phone's mag safe case. It's a good investment for you if you drive around and need hands free yet stable mount for your phone.

data.title: Great for topless and doorless jeeps
data.body: I purchased this to keep my phone from falling out of my Jeep when the doors are off. I used the sticker adhesive, as it didn’t work with my vents. It’s secure and working perfectly. You do need to have the mag safe case in order for it to work. I really enjoy this upgrade to my topless, doorless jeep lifestyle

data.title: Must have!!!
data.body: 10000/10!!!! Came with 2 adhesive mounts, and one vent mount all works great. You will need a MagSafe case or bare phone, but connects to the MagSafe strong doesn’t shake while driving even over potholes!!!

data.title: works great but limits the travel of the vent fins
data.body: This one has the advantage that it is open in the back, which allows the vent air through unimpeded when the phone is down. Strong magnet holds any iphone no problem. The only issue is, when installed (at least on my car), the range of motion of the vent fins is now limited - not much up or down anymore. Not really an issue as it remains at the angle I'm usually at, but could see that it might bother some.

data.title: Awesome!
data.body:
This little thing is really great. My favorite part is that if you already have a stand or holder that you prefer, and if it has the ball/lock mechanism for a connector, you can just attach the magnet piece there and save yourself a whole lot of trouble dealing with replacing the whole stand/clip/etc.
it’s very strong and has a nice appearance as well. Doesn’t look cheap or flimsy.

data.title: Feels high quality
data.body: Feels durable and stable. Strong magnet. Didn’t use the mount I needed a different kind for my dash.

data.title: great product
data.body: I really like this mount because it has a minimal appearance, not some big bulky thing. The magnet is quite strong which is good because I do enjoy driving fast on curvy roads and it stays put. It comes with adhesive mounts but I did not want glue on my interior so I mounted it on the vent. Its a solid lock on the vent, the swivel ball lock doesnt completely lock out all movement but its ok because the phone doesnt sag or fall out of position. It actually allows you to easily move it to any position you want without needing to tighten or loosen it and it just stays there. I read a review saying taking the phone off makes it feel like you'll tear the mount off the vent and this is true if you try to pull the phone from the top or bottom, all you have to do is pull the phone away from the mount directly from the center, above the magnet, and it comes off easily without tweaking the mount or vent. Id by this again in a heartbeat or recommend to a friend.

data.title: Love it!
data.body: So the hook extends with unscrewing the attachment! So clever as vents are all different. I love having my phone in great glancing view for directions.

data.title: Works great with Samsung S24 Plus!
data.body: I'm using this with the TORRAS Magnetic Ostand for Samsung Galaxy S24 Plus and it works great.

data.title: Works well
data.body: The magnet seems a little too strong, hard to get my phone off sometimes. Fairly sturdy with the vent mount haven’t tried the regular mount

data.title: Perfect
data.body: Make sure your case supports the magnet otherwise it might not hold or be strong hold.

data.title: Holds Phone Securely
data.body: Easy to attach. Nice strong magnet. Holds phone without slipping or moving. Great buy!

data.title: Best phone mount so far.
data.body: It’s very strong unless you have a phone case without the magnet ring on it. Works wells without a phone case too.

data.title: Solid mag safe connection
data.body: I’ve been a little slow in adopting this type of phone holder as I didn’t believe it would adequately hold my phone. I still won’t use it for a handle bar mount, but in a car this works great.

data.title: Solid Product
data.body: Secured this phone holder via vent blades. It’s nice and tight. I have no fear of my phone flying across the room. I HIGHLY recommend this product!

data.title: It works really well
data.body: I like that I can put it out of my driving veiw

data.title: Good quality
data.body: Works well, strong magnet. Holds the phone well. Happy with my purchase.

data.title: Works!
data.body: The magnet is very strong and is very easy to install!

data.title: Love!
data.body:
Sturdy and strong. Doesn’t move when I make turns and phone has never fell
Off. Magnet very strong and sits firmly in the vent.

data.title: Adhesive Option Works Best
data.body: The air vent clip was lousy but the 3m adhesive strip worked perfectly.

data.title: Soooo good i bought 2!
data.body:
I’m absolutely obsessed with this product. I immediately bought my mom one two days later and now my husband is going to order one for his car as well.

Screws right into my air vent easily and stays put in the magnet is super super strong. He will have to tug my phone off of it sometimes. Lol and I love that the amount can tilt and turn so I can turn my phone towards me or sideways if need be.

Best car I have found love this one so much

data.title: Works great
data.body: Perfect addition to my car holds phone perfectly in place very magnetic

data.title: Perfect iphone holder for car
data.body: Love this! It fits tightly on my car vent, with hooks inside with dial to tighten. The magnet is very strong, holding my iPhone securely, which is covered with a plastic phone case. I highly recommend this project for MagSafe use. (I didn't use the adhesive option, so no comment on that.)

data.title: I like this little guy!
data.body: I wanted something simple that would not take up a lot of car space - this is perfect. Using adhesive, I have it right next to my radio and at a perfect angle for viewing. less is more in my world

data.title: Great product
data.body: It actually makes me utilize my devices more. Great strength.

data.title: It works
data.body: So the option I choose does not have suction, it twists to tighten the hold on the vent. ITs a little wobbly, but it holds, and it works well. I would buy again.

data.title: Excellent
data.body: Radical, bodacious, gnarly, far out and out of sight!

data.title: Better than expected
data.body: The magnets in this is crazy strong

data.title: It holds very good
data.body: I liked the mount it hold very good

data.title: It’s better for lighter phone
data.body: Not made for my phone. Kept falling

data.title: Great item and easy to install
data.body: No problems whatsoever, suction or magnet is powerful.

data.title: Love it!
data.body: I honestly love this mount! It comes with 2 mount bases and a vent mount. I like the fact that I have options and they’re very sturdy.

data.title: Magnet is strong
data.body: I’m impressed, for the price this is a great find. Comes with 2 sticky mounts and vent clip.

data.title: Sturdy
data.body: Easy to install and VERY sturdy. Love this item.

data.title: Great product!!
data.body: Worked great!! I even bought another one for my husband because it works so well!!

data.title: Can't beat it for the price
data.body: There no way you can beat this $10 mount. I have a smaller iPhone 13 mini, holds it no problem. Even shaking it mounted it holds no problem. Mounted with the double sided tape, has enough articulation to point it in any direction. Great product overall.

data.title: Worth the money
data.body: Very strong magnet , helps rotate the phone almost 360 degrees. Buy it !!

data.title: Absolutely the best holder ever.
data.body:
Tried other magnetic holders and none of them worked well.
This one mounted easily, stays in place and holds my iPhone super strongly .
Also bought the iPhone case from Amazon
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08T881J3Q?psc=1&ref=ppx_yo2ov_dt_b_product_details
Purchased 2nd one for other car…

data.title: GREATEST CAR PHONE HOLDER!
data.body: This is small & to the point! The 'holder' is great & I love it! Does NOT get in the view (way) of my driving!

data.title: Easy Install and very sturdy
data.body: Love it, takes almos no space from my ac vent and holds small and big phones pretty good :), easy to turn and to use.

data.title: Small but straight magnet.
data.body: Looks good. Hold iPhone 15+.

data.title: Worth the money!
data.body: It’s great to have this in the car! I use mine every day!

data.title: Best yet
data.body: I've always struggled in the phone mount department when it comes to my vehicle, This one is perfect for my s24 ultra

data.title: Love
data.body: I was look for a holder for my phone for the longest while and this fits it’s my care perfect and easy to set up so no need to worry I highly recommend

data.title: Perfect
data.body: It really works. Very sturdy.

data.title: Wow, what a magnet!!
data.body: The magnet on this is so strong. I shook it around before install and my phone stayed put! Super easy to install. My only wish was that the arm on the install-bracket (what snaps into the magnet and goes against the dash) had just a little more flexibility. I put my phone on top of my dash normally, but can’t with this because it can’t do a 45° angle turn between mount and phone. Ultimately, though, an excellent mount and I’m super pleased!!

data.title: Love it.
data.body: I love this product. It makes it easy to mount your phone and grab it one the way out of the car.

data.title: Works great.
data.body: Very strong magnet, works great.

data.title: Great
data.body: Fits well and sturdy

data.title: Fits my pop-socket magnet too
data.body: Fits & is sturdy

data.title: Good product.
data.body: Well made. Adhesive is strong. Easy to position phone where you need it.

data.title: Super strong
data.body: Got these for my parents and installation was pretty self explanatory. The magnets were super strong even with a magsafe case on and my parents are super happy with these mounts. They use it on their vents but it can also be used on the dash as well.

data.title: Very strong
data.body: I love that even going through some rough roads it stays connected. Has worked amazing in my car going to get more for my husband and daughters vehicles

data.title: Works as expected
data.body: This car mount is exactly what I was looking for and works great.

data.title: Works great
data.body: It’s by far the best phone holder I’ve had over the past few years.

data.title: Amazing product
data.body: It fits perfect in the air conditioner vent. We also have the mounting piece in another vehicle and that piece works great also. I highly recommend this product.
Loved it so much bought a second one...

data.title: Great Product
data.body: Fits on the A/C Duct easily and holds tightly. I would definitely buy again.

data.title: Works great
data.body: Works great

data.title: Great
data.body: This works great! The magnet is very, very strong. It absolutely holds the phone securely in place. No issues with falling out of the vent either.

data.title: Works great.
data.body: Works so well I bought a second one for the passenger side of the car.

data.title: Great product
data.body: Easy to install. Works great and magnet is the perfect amount.

data.title: You really gotta make sure the area you are sticking it is warm enough or will not stick
data.body: After making sure it was warm enough to stick it holds amazingly and the magnetic is absolutely strong as all get out

data.title: Satisfied 😁
data.body: Works good

data.title: Phone
data.body: Works fine
